column5: Finally landed a couple in the Lower Grand, have tangled with some, but these where the first to be landed!! All fish came on Brown Snake!! Shayne
Nice looking fish there Shayne  Cheers  Craig
That first shot is a real brute for sure!!!  Great stuff!
Those are some dandy fish! Brown snake = dew worms?
YES CLAMP IT!!!  YOU ARE CORRECT!!! Shayne
Wow...some great looking fish there!  Gotta love it when you are fighting them in the tribs...great job out there.
Beauty! Hope I get to hit the lower Grand soon. About the only place I actually enjoy steelheading.
Hey shayne would you know the average amount of steelhead the head up the grand? P.S beauty fish now I am going to have to try it one day.
Good size fish! way to go ...
Those are some nice looking steel, good job. I gotta try the grand for some steel sometime as well.
silvio, it's nothing compared to the eastern Lake O tribs. You can have some decent days though.
the first picture is amazing, the steel is so round!  so i guess dew worms do work on trout   i gotta give that a try next time.
